name: Roots - CD
description:
It's been 2 years of hard work so we’re very excited to finally share this with everyone. We hope this album will impact your lives upon hearing it as much as it has impacted us recording it.

Han sido 2 a√±os trabajando fuerto en este album asi que estamos muy contentos de poder compartir el resultado con todos. Esperamos que al escuchar este album les pueda impactar sus vidas de la misma manera que impacto la nuestra mientras lo grabamos.

Release Date/Lanzado: June 28, 2011

  1. Vencedor video official
  2. Santo
  3. Toma Mi Corazon (feat. ANM)
  4. Valley of Tears
  5. Yo Te Amo
  6. Resplandor video official
  7. Sopa China
  8. Quien Contra Mi
  9. Psalm 63
  10. Go Forgive
  11. Tocame
  12. Come To You

name: Self Titled - CD
description:
Our Self-Titled Studio Debut from a Spanish Rock Band based in Toronto, Ontario. It contains a mix of spanish and english songs which showcases the bands’ sound before the addition of Kyle, our crazy screamer. Though there isn’t much screaming, there’s a ton of passion and hints of direction to where the band was headed.

Release Date: January 9, 2009

  1. Fuera
  2. Para Ti
  3. Te Necesito
  4. Sacred
  5. Born Today
  6. Su Gloria

Version MP3 Gratis! / Free MP3 Version!
